scripts.nuke: docker stop clientDocker && docker rm clientDocker && docker volume rm clientDockerData && rm -rf prisma/migrations
scripts.launchDocker: docker run --name clientDocker -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=docker -d -p 5432:5432 -v clientDockerData:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:latest
scripts.createDB: npx prisma2 migrate save --name 'init' --experimental && npx prisma2 migrate up --experimental
